title: Valor
summaries: The Valor is a pre-Hardmode yoyo that can extend up to 14 tiles away from the player. Its flight time lasts 11 seconds before returning to the player. The Valor has a 1/7 (14.29%) chance of being obtained from the Locked Gold Chests found in the Dungeon, as well as a 1/7 (14.29%) chance of being obtained from Golden Lock Boxes(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Sell: 1 GC75 SC
